

## Column `r col.name`

* **Mean:** `r mean(col, na.rm = T)`
* **Standard Deviation:** `r sd(col, na.rm = T)`
* **Sum:** `r sum(col, na.rm = T)`


### Plots

```{r}
ggplot(data = df, aes(x= col))+
  geom_histogram(aes(col), na.rm = T)+
  xlab(col.name)+
  ylab("Number")+
  ggtitle(paste("Distribution of", col.name))+
  theme_bw()
boxplot(col)
```
